title: Why does Riot report system is so unfair?
body: When I play a game and a dude running down. All I say is " This yi is fk inting ". And yet he report me and get me ban for 14 days just because I say this in Twisted Treeline. Not just that the shen who play with me also disconnect since this yi trolling so hard and act like a bot in game. Yet Riot does not improve this report system by looking at all the play. The only thing they look at is the chat and is so frustrating when trolls does not get ban by Riot. Riot clearly trying to improve only in their art in game(maps, skins, chromas,...) while the game itself have so much flaws and they does not want to improve something like this.

replies.body: post chat logs to see if thats all you really said

The game mode does not matter, nor does it matter what other players are doing or have done. Flaming is against the rules, and this is clear in the Summoner's Code. Whether you agree with this or not, it is not unfair because **those same rules are applied to all players**.

Furthermore, trolling players **do** get punished, and if you'd read this board you'd see that some players do come to complain. The reason more do not is because most times they **know** what they did was wrong - so the only ones who come complain are those who think they've succeeded in cheating Riot - they think they "look" like they weren't intentionally feeding - but they were.

You should look at why the system is broken. The system just need 1 person report to make a ban while all you need to do is saying a certain amount of words to get ban. And those who report tend to false reporting and the system is so automated that their is no real human look at the map to see what is going on. This just mean the 4 years system completely behind its time.
No, saying "a certain amount of words" does not get a ban. Period. Nor do false reports.
You can get ban for saying it once. Second,  many player report other and riot just look at the player who get their honor lock first.

Nope, that's not how it works at all.

The only thing you can get banned for saying once is things like hate speech, and telling other players to kill themselves. Period. Nothing else gets you banned for "saying it once".

Furthermore, the system **does not care how many times you are reported**. Each reported game is reviewed by the system - if you did not misbehave, or if you only minorly did, it **will not** punish you.

If you understand the system, you'll actually find it to be pretty fair. 

I'll give you a hint; The system doesn't punish based on severity alone. It punishes based on consistency x severity, meaning you can be punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or many many games of mild toxicity. 


I'm guessing you have a habit of accusing others of trolling, and that consistent harassment is what got you punished.

False reports get tossed out,  group reports don't do anything extra to speed up a punishment.

Nobody ever got a 14 day ban for saying "This yi is fk inting". Shit, i say that all the time.

A 14 day means repeated extreme rulebreaking, and next time your account is permbanned. Time to stop blaming the system if you want to keep it.

Just gotta clarify, it does not have to be extreme at all. You can reach a permaban off of consistent light flaming. Consistency x severity. I take extreme to mean severe in this context, so maybe you just didnt mean it that way. But you did say "repeated" extreme rulebreaking. You can reach permaban off repeated light rulebreaking, as well.

Depends on how you define light flaming. I have never seen a 14-day ban for anything less that 100+ lines of nothing but screaming brat meltdown across multiple games. permban is easier, since rito has no time for your shit after a 14-day.

Thats not "extreme" imo, but yeah youre right, it depends what you consider extreme. If you consider that extreme, thats just odd to me, but youre entitled to your opinion.

The same thing go with you. The system itself is not well update and all it seen it the chat. Trolling and inting tend to get ban at an extreme low rate. While blaming 1 sentence can cause you get a whole ban just for a troll that mess up your game.
